detail_desc: Small bag in grained imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap and zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 4.5x14x19.5 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fully lined swimsuit with a print motif on the front and flounce-trimmed shoulder straps that meet at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Small comfort blanket in an organic cotton weave with a padded head. Length from top to toe approx. 31 cm. Wingspan approx. 29 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline.
Short shorts in light sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
V-neck top in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps.
V-neck jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs. Slim fit.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Santa costume in fleece with long sleeves, press-studs at the back and a matching Santa hat.
Cropped top in stretch cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Fully lined bathing suit with narrow shoulder straps that lace up and tie at the base of the back.
Pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, chunky metal chain necklace with large pendants of approx. 2.5-7 cm. Adjustable length 38-46 cm.
Chinos in an airy cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
A pair of metal earrings in the shape of eyes decorated with glass rhinestones and pearly plastic beads. Length 3.5 cm.

Lace push-up bra with narrow, crossover straps at the front and underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Jacket in soft, patterned thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves and trims around the cuffs and hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with elasticated jersey ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, one back pocket and a fake fly.
Aqua shoes in patterned scuba fabric with elastication around the top, a loop front and back, and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with a high, drawstring collar, dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and a drawstring with a fastener at the hem.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend designed to be hidden inside your shoes. The socks have elastication around the openings and a concealed silicone trim around the heel for best fit.
Jumper in a pattern knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Baby Exclusive. Dungaree dress in an organic cotton waffle weave with a lined front and frill-trimmed straps with adjustable buttoning at the front. Elasticated waist and a flared skirt with integral puff pants that have elasticated hems and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with embroidery on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.

Small backpack in imitation leather with adjustable shoulder straps, an imitation suede flap with a decorative metal ring and concealed magnetic fastener, and press-studs at the sides. Lined. Size 11x19x19 cm.

Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a square neckline and wide, rib-knit flounce over the shoulders. Long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in a fine-knit viscose blend with an elasticated waist.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket and chest pocket with a button. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a belt, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight legs. Diagonal front pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets, a hammer loop and a leg pocket.
Top in patterned jersey with a boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with buttons at the back and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Waist belt in imitation leather and elastic with a decorative metal ring at the front and a metal hook fastening at the back. Width 4.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered appliqué on the chest, long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.

Fitted jacket in soft velvet made from recycled polyester. Deep V-neck, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and jetted front pockets. Decorative covered buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Grosgrain belt with a decorative appliqué made from recycled sparkly stones and beads, and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening.
Hat in a fine-knit cotton blend with decorative rabbit ears on top, a ribbed hem and a strap with hook and loop fastening under the chin. Cotton jersey lining.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a rib-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.
Biker jacket in shimmering metallic imitation leather with decorative shoulder tabs and notch lapels with press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front and zipped front pockets. Lined.

Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, adjustable tabs with press-studs at the sides and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Jumper in a soft cashmere knit with long raglan sleeves in a relaxed fit. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and long, wide legs with creases.
Hat in soft, garter-stitched cotton with small knitted ears on top and a ribbed hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.

Fully lined swimsuit with padded cups and removable inserts. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and concealed elastication under the bust for extra support. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy and a silicone trim at the top. The swimsuit is made partly from recycled polyamide and polyester.
Two-strand necklace of thin metal chains, one with a coin-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 40-47-5 cm.
Monkstraps with adjustable metal buckles at the sides. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly. Side pockets, a coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a smocked waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cardigan knitted in soft, organic cotton with a shawl collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Narrow, elastic hairband decorated with fabric flowers.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable straps, a wrapover front with ties at one side and a flounced hem. Unlined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with raw edges, a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Pattern-weave jacket with notch lapels and a button at the front. Welt front pockets, 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams, and a single back vent. Lined.
Round-neck T-shirt in soft, premium cotton jersey. Slim fit.

Ankle-length trousers in cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Fake back pockets and straight-cut legs that flare gently to the hem with creases front and back.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with lace details. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and long, wide sleeves with lace trims.
Cotton hairbands with a bow at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey made from an organic cotton blend with a deep neckline, decorative buttons and short sleeves.

Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a button placket and a braided, detachable belt in imitation suede with a metal buckle. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Dress with a marled jersey bodice, short sleeves, a print motif on the front, a gathered seam at the waist with a small frill trim and a printed, lined tulle skirt.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Cigarette trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.

Blouse in a soft weave with a unique nursing feature, a V-neck with pleats and a pleat at the back. Long, wide sleeves with gathers and buttoned cuffs. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details, removable inserts, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and wide ribbing at the hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
